Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

I am testing things out in QuestJS, and I believe I have found a way to check for mobile browsers.

I cannot test this on Mac or any other Apple devices.

I would be grateful to anyone who entered BROWSER with this game loaded in a Mac, an iPhone, or an iPad then posted the output here.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ltleh05edkg5e5w7ciegbq/browser-check
